title: Regarding Braum
body: I just got flamed into oblivion for playing safe as braum by my mid laner that wanted to 1v4 a dragon fight, then died, in which i picked up a kill. according to my team, the entire game was my fault, because i was playing too passive. why would i play agressive if we are not ahead? i used my ult to disengage and try to shield from lucians ult and whatnot. and got flamed because other died trying to make sily plays, how is that fair on my confidence as a player for one, and for two, the enemy mid laner finished 12/0, and our rengar went 0/8. but the game is my fault. can someone maybe coach me or tell me where i went wrong that game? thanks

replies.body: dude you didn't do anything wrong, sometimes you get people on the internet that treat you like shit, just mute them and move along, you obviously did what you did in that game they can't change it.

There was one thing that you did wrong -  you didn't /mute all

I know that one you're tilted or abused once, it's damage done, but at least it won't get any worse.

> [{quoted}](name=TwoHeadedFreak,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=frE2FFEn,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-04T21:05:44.276+0000)

> There was one thing that you did wrong -  you didn't /mute all
> 
> I know that one you're tilted or abused once, it's damage done, but at least it won't get any worse.

Yeah, i muted for a while, but i like seeing the chat, mainly because i feel i can use the chat in a good  way rather than flaming, which i am guilty of doing myself.

I don't think you did anything wrong, even if you went fully in, since the player is a mid laner, they would never have basic attacked the champions to activate your passive anyway since they'd be too busy spamming spells. 

Also, if your team want to flame, they have to actually be there, you had no jungler or even ADC with you to take the dragon. Not your fault you were out numbered and the Mid wanted to go in.
Haha thanks for the votes of confidence, i just feel there is some way i could have played better.
You went wrong by letting trash players make you doubt yourself.

Hey, although what you did wasnot wrong, it definitely broke the rules(silly imo) a support has to follow whatever the team says. and unless they are just descriminating against one player supports are basically to blame from most of what goes wrong, even if its bad plays from the others, bad luck son https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3C4-pnMiGc&t=334s
